name: Psychometrer Eiji
overview: The Playstation game is based on the popular Japanese manga and television series, you play the part of Asuma Eiji, a "sensitive" who can view the past of a person just by touching him/her. Goaded by detective Otsuka Nene, the unusual duo solve crimes in this 3-D action-thriller. The gameplay is a mix between an action and an adventure game, some levels of the games are a beat'em up sequence, in other the player have to find an item to advance, others are a time limited sequence.
